verses.name: Judges 2:7
verses.text: And the people served the Lord all the days of Joshua, and all the days of the elders that outlived Joshua, who had seen all the great works of the Lord, that he did for Israel.

verses.name: Judges 2:8
verses.text: And Joshua the son of Nun, the servant of the Lord, died, being an hundred and ten years old.

verses.name: Judges 2:9
verses.text: And they buried him in the border of his inheritance in Timnath–heres, in the mount of Ephraim, on the north side of the hill Gaash.
